question: Who clinched the 2018 Barcelona Open tennis tournament?
explanation: World number one Rafael Nadal lifted his 11th Barcelona Open tennis title with a win over Greek teenager Stefanos Tsitsipas. Nadal, who won his 400th match on clay in the semifinal, needed the victory in Barcelona to secure his No. 1 ranking. It was the 77th title overall for Nadal tying him with John McEnroe for fourth best in the Open Era.
